item.title: Pet feeder
item.description: When you have several cat, it is often a nightmare to control the quantity of food. This project, based on this one (https://www.instructables.com/Automatic-Arduino-Powered-Pet-Feeder/), aim to create a pet feeder that deliver food to the cat automatically and a full control trought Home Assistant server. This project use Raspberry pi and Arduino, servo motor, weight balance and RFID reader. GitHub under constrution
